name.text: Using Similarity to Determine Unknown Lengths and Scale Factor

questiontext.text:
In the diagram shown below, triangle \(OA'B'\) is an enlargement of triangle \(OAB\).

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard('jxgbox', { boundingbox: [-12, 10, 4, -4], axis: false, pan: { enabled: false }, zoom: { enabled: false }, showNavigation: false }); /* === Static points (not to scale) === */ var O = board.create('point', [0,0], {name:'O', fixed:true, size:2}); var A = board.create('point', [-4,0], {name:'A', fixed:true, visible:false}); // invisible var B = board.create('point', [-4,3], {name:'B', fixed:true, visible:false}); // invisible var A1 = board.create('point', [-8,0], {name:"A'", fixed:true, size:2}); var B1 = board.create('point', [-8,6], {name:"B'", fixed:true, size:2}); /* === Draw edges === */ function edge(P1,P2){ return board.create('segment',[P1,P2],{strokeWidth:2,fixed:true}); } edge(O,A); edge(A,B); edge(B,O); // Original triangle edge(O,A1); edge(A1,B1); edge(B1,O); // Enlarged triangle edge(A,A1); edge(B,B1); // Connectors /* === Labels with just numbers === */ // Original triangle board.create('text', [() => (O.X()+A.X())/2, () => (O.Y()+A.Y())/2 - 0.3, "{#OA#} cm"]); board.create('text', [() => (A.X()+B.X())/2, () => (A.Y()+B.Y())/2 + 0.3, "{#AB#} cm"]); board.create('text', [() => (O.X()+B.X())/2, () => (O.Y()+B.Y())/2 + 0.3, "{#OB#} cm"]); // Enlarged triangle board.create('text', [() => (O.X()+A1.X())/2, () => (O.Y()+A1.Y())/2 - 0.3, "A"]); board.create('text', [() => (O.X()+B1.X())/2, () => (O.Y()+B1.Y())/2 + 0.3, "B"]); // Connector BB' board.create('text', [() => (B.X()+B1.X())/2, () => (B.Y()+B1.Y())/2 + 0.3, "{#BB1#} cm"]); /* Prevent interaction */ board.renderer.svgRoot.style.pointerEvents = "none"; [[/jsxgraph]]

(a). Identify the centre of enlargement.

[[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]][[feedback:prt1]]

(b). Find the scale factor of the enlargement.

[[input:ans2]] [[validation:ans2]][[feedback:prt2]]

(c). Calculate the lengths of

(i). \(A'B'\) [[input:ans3]] cm[[validation:ans3]][[feedback:prt3]]

(ii). \(OA'\) [[input:ans4]] cm[[validation:ans4]][[feedback:prt4]]

generalfeedback.text:
Worked solution

(a).The centre of enlargement is \(O\).

(b). Scale factor = \(\frac {OB'}{OB} = \frac{{@OB1@}}{{@OB@}} = {@K@}\)

(c). (i). \(\frac{OB'}{OB} = \frac{A'B'}{AB} \Rightarrow \frac{{@OB1@}}{{@OB@}} = \frac{A'B'}{{@AB@}}\)

\(\quad \quad \quad \quad A'B'= \frac{{@AB@}\times{@OB1@}}{{@AB@}}={@ta2@}\) cm

(ii). \(\frac{OB'}{OB} = \frac{OA'}{OA} \Rightarrow \frac{{@OB1@}}{{@OB@}} = \frac{OA'}{{@OA@}}\)

\(\quad \quad \quad \quad OA'= \frac{{@OB1@}\times{@OA@}}{{@OB@}}={@ta3@}\) cm

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

qtest.description: Test case assuming the teacher's input gets full marks.
